     Your code:
       t01 <- sqrt((1 + 2 + 3)^2) * 2
     Expected:
       t01 <- sqrt((1 + 2 + 3)^2) * 2 # 12
b: ✔ atomic [1]: TRUE
     Your code:
       t02 <- {
     t <- 10
     t <- t + 100
     (t == 110)
   }
     Expected:
       t02 <- { # TRUE
     t <- 10
     t <- t + 100
     (t == 110)
   }
c: ✔ atomic [1]: 12
     Your code:
       t03 <- t03a - 100
     Expected:
       t03a <- t01 + 100
   t03 <- t03a - 100
d: ✔ atomic [1]: 12
     Your code:
       t04 <- t04a - 100
     Expected:
       t04a <- t01 + 100
   t04 <- t04a - 100
e: ✔ atomic [1]: TRUE
     Your code:
       t06 <- ((t01 - 12) == 0)
     Expected:
       t06 <- ((t01 - 12) == 0) # TRUE
f: ✔ atomic [1]: TRUE
     Your code:
       t07 <- sum(c(6, 12, 18) == ((X + X) * 3)) == 3
     Expected:
       t07 <- sum(c(6, 12, 18) == ((X + X) * 3)) == 3 # TRUE
g: ✔ atomic [1]: FALSE
     Your code:
       t08 <- (f(10) == 11)
     Expected:
       t08 <- (f(10) == 11) # TRUE
